website_summaries.verdict: Beats the competition in terms of quality, versatility, and quantity. The best set on the market today.
pros: Sleek handles are comfortable and easy to grip
20 pieces offer enough variety for virtually any task
We like the convenient tray for easy access and organization of the tools
cons: The set is on the higher end of the price spectrum, but you get a lot of tools for your money

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first time of use.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a field tech for volvo construction equipment. Bought these to try them out because I had a lot of screwdrivers that werent part of a set. Gearwrench has been decent rachet wrench company, couldn't bring myself to pay for the set of the tool truck. You get what you pay for. Broke one the fits time I used it packing hyd cylinder. Not worth my time to warranty. Will be spending the money for MATCO.
customer_reviews.author: Off Constantly

customer_reviews.title: Better than Snap-On
customer_reviews.text: I'm rebuilding my tool collection and was seeking an affordable alternative to the big-name Professional quality tools I used to have before they were stolen. I believe these are the best screwdrivers I've ever used in 40 years of mechanic-ing. Cheaper then Snap-On and the same or better quality. I was so impressed I purchased the scraper set, and the hook and pick set too.
customer_reviews.author: G. E. Glaum

customer_reviews.title: Nice screwdrivers for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very adequate set of screwdrivers. They are not great. I would put them on par with the Craftsman professional line. The tips are magnetic and there is a good assortment of sizes and lengths. Personally, I think the handles are too rounded and don't give the best grip. I replaced a set of snap-on screwdrivers that were stolen with these. Great for the money, but not even close to the snap-on. I am glad I purchased them. There was no way I was going to spend $300 from snap-on.
customer_reviews.author: Travis M

customer_reviews.title: Many sizes and quality tips.
customer_reviews.text: Quality set with every phillips and flat blade size you might need. Throwing in The t15 and t20 torx is usless however because you need many more sizes than those two.Most people buying this nice/expensive a set will already have a set of torx. Handles are comfortable for high torque and the tips grip very well. If stolen, i'd replace with the same brand. Worth the price IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty good screwdrivers
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty good screwdrivers. I am a technician for Toyota and they have held up pretty well to some pretty heavy usage and abuse. Some of the thinner, longer screw drivers have bent a small amount. Even at a professional level, pretty darn good. Would recommend to friends, great deal to quality ratio.
customer_reviews.author: DanKamYouKnow

customer_reviews.title: It works better than Craftsman and Harborfreight I tried to remove some ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set over a year . The first time I use it I was impressed . It works better than Craftsman and Harborfreight I tried to remove some screws using Craftsman I couldn't remove it it will slip . I used Gearwrench and it remove it easy . I will buy another set it is cheaper in Amazon than Ebay . It looks professional for I am profession auto mechanic gas and diesel engines , civillian and military vehicles . People who complain about Gearwrench screwdrivers are stupid don't know how to use it . Ghassan
customer_reviews.author: Ghassan Mounib Jurdi

customer_reviews.title: Got my moneys worth...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sets of the GEARWRENCH 20 Pc. Phillips/Slotted/Torx Dual Material Screwdriver Set. One for home and one for work. Home gets a little use but work is a professional environment. I build automation controls. I have been using these for about a month and can honestly say that I truly got my moneys worth. All are quality tools that i'm sure will last for years, I also have a full set of the metric ratcheting wrenches I have owned for years that are absolutely fantastic. Gearwrench is a go to tool for me.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Preseent for the wife!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay after half my screwdrivers ended up in house.. i desided that wife needed her own set and bingo .. she was a happy camper. My life got better.. as she now has her own set and i am in process of reclaiming my screwdrivers for the garage again. But they are very nice seem sturdy and the price wasnt to bad for a bit set like this. So gents a solutaion to our tool disapearing problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dj Voodooman

customer_reviews.title: I bought these and love them, showed up a day before they were ...
customer_reviews.text: I am tired of buying over price snap off ,lol, or someone taking one and never get it back. I bought these and love them , showed up a day before they were supposed to , took them to work and put them to test . I love them , and the storage tray they all come in fits in my tool box.
customer_reviews.author: gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Set - Gearwrench ScrewDrivers
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this set My favorite part is the tray they come in. I like my tools organized and the tray helps make that possible. The fit, finish and variety of sizes is great.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Myers

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Set of Screwdrivers
customer_reviews.text: Truth is, I was nervous about buying these. I've never owned anything by Gearwrench, and even though I've always heard good about them, I don't normally buy "Oriental" tools. I have to admit I was surprised. Very well made and the 1/4" flat next to the handle is a big bonus. I plan on buying other Gearwrench tools to go with these. I work in a very heavy industry, heat treating, and these screwdrivers are used daily. Each and every one, so far, has proven it's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: The search is over - Best Value Screwdrivers
customer_reviews.text: I rarely want to write reviews but these screwdrivers are fantastic. I am just in the process of building out my mechanics tool chest and purchased these. Previously I had used craftsman and Kline screwdrivers which are fine, but these are head and shoulders above. They have magnetic tips, comfortable handles and a great organizational tray. All of these reason make this the best quality and value that I see on the market. I haven’t used snapon screwdrivers, but with a lifetime warranty and a ton of benefits I think these are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: bud tugley

customer_reviews.title: As good if not better than tool trucks tools
customer_reviews.text: I have been replacing my worn out snap-on, Mac and Matco tools with gear wrench tools. As good if not better than tool trucks tools at a 1/4 the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for a few months and have found that I like them. I would not mind if they had magnetic tips (from the factory anyway) or if the grips were less "rubbery" and thus easier to wipe off but nonetheless, they seem to be a pretty good screwdriver set. Perhaps not quite as durable as GearWrench stuff typically is, but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: snatch

customer_reviews.title: Well made drivers
customer_reviews.text: So far these have been some of the best drivers I have ever owned. The magnetic tips help hold screws in place when you can’t use 2 hands and they fit the screw heads very well unlike other divers out there.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Steinert

customer_reviews.title: Best Screwdriver set I have/will ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure: I am a HUGE Gearwrench fan. I got these as a present, and I absolutely love them. I will admit that when i first got them, I was surprised at the handles and how they were fairly plastic. I was hoping for something a bit more comfortable, but once i started using them I fell in love with them. I may not pay the full price for them, but on sale they are an amazing deal!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D.

customer_reviews.title: Great screwdrivers
customer_reviews.text: This kit comes with just about all the screw drivers you will need, how ever. I know it’s super tempting but do not, I repeat DO NOT use them as pry bars. They will snap. I know it’s super tempting but don’t. They are great screw drivers but no pry bars
customer_reviews.author: sal

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy or reccomend.
customer_reviews.text: The shipping tray, the packaging can not be used to hang the set on my peg board. The drivers do not indicate if it is a philips head or flat, so when a driver is in my tool bag I can not tell what type of driver I am picking. Simple thing but a huge miss on the manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: Dal1wrd

customer_reviews.title: Ok screwdriver set..
customer_reviews.text: It is ok screwdriver set....my only beef is the handle.... too round, needs to have some kind of edge so it doesn't roll off bench or any other surface.
customer_reviews.author: Tech 1

customer_reviews.title: Stay Organized
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a set of screwdrivers that would come with a tray I could use in my roll away tool box to keep them organized and shadowed, something I have learned to enjoy at work, it's nice not to have to hunt through a box to find what you want, and even nicer to know if anything is missing at a glance, the tray fits right inside of a drawer with room to spare, great if you like to be organized like I do.
customer_reviews.author: CRS

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Received my first three orders of screwdrivers and pliers set. I ordered specifically for me the plastic organizer to put in my tool box. Very disappointed in the flimsy plastic holder. Come on gearwrench we work on Eguipment and the holder needs to be as stout as your products. Will rethink future orders because of this
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT MCKNETT

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased so far.
customer_reviews.text: Have not really had a chance to really use them so far but I had no problem with the molded plastic the came in, fit right in my top box drawer. best set found yet with good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Philip LeMerise

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Screwdriver Set for a Really Good Price!
customer_reviews.text: These screwdrivers feel amazing in the hand. At my school we use Matco screwdrivers and they feel no where near as good as these GearWrench screwdrivers feel. Also the pricing on these is awesome when compared to the tool truck brands.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Leinart

customer_reviews.title: great set
customer_reviews.text: definitely better then craftsmen, husky and kobalt sets. well worth the investment . The storage tray fits in my 18 in depth tool box drawer and I find it to be very helpful when cleaning up after a project (no more lost tools).
customer_reviews.author: Mom Wants Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very decent set of screwdrivers. I honestly bought it for the case. I was sick of screwdrivers rolling around my box. I was pleasantly surprised with the quality and variety.
customer_reviews.author: Japdawap

customer_reviews.title: Great but needs better diversity
customer_reviews.text: Good overall could have used more medium sized drivers Either really long and big or minuscule and small diameter A 4 and 6inch Phillip's and flat head would have been nice. But for the money cant complain
customer_reviews.author: Grant.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. You don’t need a name brand like snap on or matco. This set has what you need ! Been using them for a few years now. Never had an issue with them.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Amazo

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a hobbyist or someone that requires smaller screwdrivers, there are large drivers just not that many. Over all it is a great set to have.
customer_reviews.author: E Z

customer_reviews.title: Screwdrivers and case is good
customer_reviews.text: The screwdrivers work good but I broke 2 of the picks and I really like the case it fits in my took box drawer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy
customer_reviews.text: I opened this as soon as it arrived. It’s an outstanding product! Well made. Thanks a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas K. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the money. Wish the handles were a bit bigger and had more texture like the Snap-ons do, but I'd still give it 5 stars. Buy this and you'll be covered for most stuff and then get the longer 18" and longer ones one at a time from snap on when you can afford them.
customer_reviews.author: DHC3T

customer_reviews.title: yep I would by again
customer_reviews.text: well I like them and they seem to be pretty dim tough i have already used a few as pry bars and nothing broke
customer_reviews.author: HILLBILLY

customer_reviews.title: Tray is great, drivers are great
customer_reviews.text: As close to a tool truck brand of screwdrivers without blowing 100$+. Love that they had a tray, but it makes you OCD
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product!
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality Tools. This was my first tool set as i just bought a home and had to stock up on tools. I would buy again. They do the job. if you take care of them, they will take care of you
customer_reviews.author: hunter

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of these in my hand, and the tray is reasonably sturdy. It was a little tight in the drawer I put it in, but it was flexible enough to get in there while keeping the screwdrivers nicely organized.
customer_reviews.author: DANA M.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good screwdrivers
customer_reviews.text: Solid screwdrivers. This package has a great variety of sizes and lengths of drivers. I have had no issues so far, but they are not getting used frequently.
customer_reviews.author: C. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great screw driver set for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice screwdriver set, handles are really comfortable bought these for use around the house and car maintenance so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Thatdudewithaguitar

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good set for the money, nothing to brag about though
customer_reviews.text: The printed info on the grip/handle that says the size of the driver, as well as "GEARWRENCH," is all sub-par. On my 2.5mm slotted (flat) screwdriver, the print rubbed right off in a single-use when I was working on my car outside in heavy humidity. It's a little lame because now I'm writing the sizes in Sharpie. Other than that, it's not a bad set.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Love the included organizer
customer_reviews.text: Good solid set that includes a nice organizer to use in tool cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Brent H

customer_reviews.title: Gear wrench good quality. Good as snap on.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a friend gear wrench screw 20 pice. Nice looking screw with glass beaded Tips makes it nice from slipping stripping out the screw.
customer_reviews.author: S.Welch

customer_reviews.title: gearwrench has done it again with a another quality product ...
customer_reviews.text: gearwrench has done it again with a another quality product! i replaced my craftsman junk with these and basically use the craftsman set foe chiseling and pounding with. bonus is they have a magnetic head.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Retire your multi-bit driver today
customer_reviews.text: Finally retired my drawer of cheap multi-bit drivers. These are so much easier to work with and there is a driver for every need. Feel good in the hand. Clean easily. Strong and precise tips. I wish I would have bought a set years ago. Would have saved a lot of stripped screw headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: great tools
customer_reviews.text: big fan of gearwrench, i have high expectations when i order their tools and they haven’t let me down yet. great set, fees good in your hands and i haven’t broken any of the tips off yet.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great set. I am diesel mechanic and use one of the products out of set everyday. Product is holding up great and no issues as of now.
customer_reviews.author: A-Gre3wal

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: this is a really nice set of drivers. It is holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: just me, gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great set of drivers
customer_reviews.text: This set has every screwdriver you'll ever need. They fit comfortably and are well-made. The magnetic tips are very handy.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL L

customer_reviews.title: Great product for an everyday mechanic, will hold up just like the big name tool truck tools
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, performs well... Handles fit comfortable in hand and the design is just right for getting a good grip... have pretty much stopped buying tool truck tools and started buying more gear wrench... Great for the everyday mechanic
customer_reviews.author: chris mcleod

customer_reviews.title: Versatile screwdriver set!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new screwdriver set for my garage, as I am a fairly active weekend mechanic. Not wanting to pay "tool truck" prices for a set, I wanted a quality set that will hold up to the rigors of constant use, and my first impression of this set, I would say it looks promising. I like the fact that they come in an organizer tray for easy storage in my cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Tim R

customer_reviews.title: Good screw driver set
customer_reviews.text: Very good design and good size and feel to the screwdrivers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonn Customerrrr

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and amazing price for the selection of screw drivers provided
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had brought these originally, I had brought a smaller set at my local auto store but needed the smaller screw drivers. Gearwrench quality has never let me down and I find much better quality than Craftsman in the garage
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early. Nice set if screwdrivers fits perfectly in the toolbox
customer_reviews.author: mlbriz57

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set of screw drivers!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have abused these screw drivers and they have taken a beating and still are in perfect shape!!!! The magnetized tip is also great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Surface rust
customer_reviews.text: A couple of the drivers had surface rust and rust stains on the handle.
customer_reviews.author: FR

customer_reviews.title: These work fine and are decent quality
customer_reviews.text: These work fine and are decent quality. The grips on the screwdrivers give good leverage.
customer_reviews.author: MM8

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of screwdrivers.
customer_reviews.text: I like the gear wrench line of tools and these screwdrivers are no exception. Most any screwdriver you might need, unless you are a diesel mechanic. The tray is flimsy - more for shipping than for toolbox organization. Wish it were stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell A. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Gearwrench does it again
customer_reviews.text: Gearwrenches quality tools are some of the best I found this set single handedly beat out snap on and matco for quality and price
customer_reviews.author: DillonK

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: After two months of use, little wear and tear on the black coating on the tips of the tools, but very little to no wear and tear on the actual metal. Set is holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: AlexdaMAN

customer_reviews.title: Feels awesome in your hand
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cause I have been replacing worn out Craftsman and Habor Freight tools. Gearwrench is a awesome in between for price and quality of tools. Heads and tails better quality than Craftsman, but not as pricey as snap, mac, or matco tool trucks. But every bit of quality as they have, just not made in USA, and not paying for the name. These are so much better than my Craftsman. They look and feel like pro tools that will last.
customer_reviews.author: David A Suggs

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: they have a nice case but takes up a lot of room. the variety of sizes is awesome and very useful for any application.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Swartzfager

customer_reviews.title: good scewdriver set for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very very nice screw driver set! Strong tips and even magnetic! Buy these! I give 4 stars cause im not king on the handles but for that price cant beat it. Some even have the thing in end to slip wrench on to help turn it! Wish it had that on all of them though but some better than none!
customer_reviews.author: twixter08

customer_reviews.title: This is a  high quality  screwdriver set.
customer_reviews.text: I have been useing tools for over 40 years and one thing I know is you need to have good quality tools.I am not saying you need snap on quality type tools but Craftsman or Habor frieght..umm no thank you.These fit the bill.I have a set and use them almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: michael foulks

customer_reviews.title: They’re great! -Tony the Tiger
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to have a problem with them, the handles hold up to all kinds of automotive fluids that are corrosive to some other materials. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Corey A.

customer_reviews.title: Great set, unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! Great price. Stand up to tough every day use. Wide variety of drivers in various sizes. Good set for the DIYer or seasoned technician.
customer_reviews.author: Ian D

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great set!! Very sturdy material and pretty decent quality handle. Great for the money
customer_reviews.author: Einar Dayton Huber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This set makes me really happy when I work on cars
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Lattice

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: First time using one it broke. I am very disappointed and unsure if I would buy gearwrench again
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: tips are awesome they are magnetic and the fit into fasteners is ...
customer_reviews.text: tips are awesome they are magnetic and the fit into fasteners is perfect. handles could use a bit more finishing. still i would buy again
customer_reviews.author: LS Truck guy

customer_reviews.title: Another great gearwrench product.
customer_reviews.text: I own several gearwrench tools and I use and love all of them. This screwdriver set is nice feel nice and works great.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work everyday the grip is awesome , best buy for the cost

customer_reviews.title: nicer than expected
customer_reviews.text: wasn't expecting snap on, but they surprised me. I'm glad I bought these over the craftsman or other options.

customer_reviews.title: Great set of screwdrivers
customer_reviews.text: Great set of screwdrivers, I pry and hammer these daily (I know I shouldnt) and have yet to bend or chip
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Love these. the storage is also great
customer_reviews.text: Love these. the storage is also great. I am a mechanic and i use these everyday. They hold out well.
customer_reviews.author: V K

customer_reviews.title: Mechanics Set!
customer_reviews.text: Great set for A Great Price. Really Like the Bolsters on the Larger Screwdrivers and The Whole set costs the Same as 2 of My Tool Truck Screwdrivers!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Graves

customer_reviews.title: Great screwdriver set my snap on guy has these on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great screwdriver set my snap on guy has these on his truck for $200. I thought Hey let me look on amazon I picked it up for less than $50. I work on heavy diesel equipment and they have held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with this set...magnetized and feel good in your hand.

customer_reviews.title: high quality, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy and pleased with the quality and fir the price you cant go wrong

customer_reviews.title: great screw driver set more than the average person would ...
customer_reviews.text: great screw driver set more than the average person would need but if you needed it that size you got it quality of plastic holder cheesy but if its going to sit in your box works good

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set of tools that feels solid. Well worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Master piece
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for multiple reasons big or small

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable. They have the torque nut on the bottom like snap on

customer_reviews.title: Best set for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best screw driver set for the money. I own plenty of gearwrench stuff. I'm a mechanic/lube tech and all there stuff holds up to the demand.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tools, for any kind of mechanic, or fix it up person.
customer_reviews.author: shady48

customer_reviews.title: I took away one star because the wrenching flats should ...
customer_reviews.text: I took away one star because the wrenching flats should be larger (to accept a boxed-end wrench over the flathead drivers). Also I don't see why they can't offer wrenching flats on a few more of these screwdrivers. But WYSIWYG. Career-quality tools.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Householder

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic holder
customer_reviews.text: Good screw drivers nice handles. Don't expect the the holder to last long. In the photos it looks ridged but is cheaply made and thin plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I love that every screwdriver has its own spot in the tray. Why any tools come loose is baffling to me.

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great set of screwdrivers for the price. I have lots of high end tools and these screwdrivers are in the category....just no big name
customer_reviews.author: JLV

customer_reviews.title: Great ser worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of screw drivers. I grew up in a family that worked on cars for a living so I tend to have higher expectations with tools, but this set is very good and durable set I will trust to last a very long time. People complain the case is very flimsy, but if you just use the case as an organizer in a tool box then it is the perfect set up.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a good set of screwdrivers haven't used them yet but seem to be well made

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the quality and the price, great set for the rest if the family to use so they stay out of my tool box.

customer_reviews.text: Great starter set. Great price! Easy to store in your tool box with no problems of forgetting where they are.

customer_reviews.title: Great screwdriver set!
customer_reviews.text: Geat set of screwdrivers. They are exactly what I had hoped when delivered. And again, another great product manufacture by Gearwrench.

customer_reviews.text: Most of my screwdrivers have vanished. This is a complete set I needed. Every house needs a complete set of screwdrivers.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tools
customer_reviews.text: Case could be of better quality (being gear wrench), but all in all its a good quality set.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!! buy it you won't regret it!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: These are great screwdrivers!
customer_reviews.text: These are great screwdrivers!!! I would defenitely buy another set if I had too in an instant. By far the best bang for your buck.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality! These will replace all of my craftsman ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Quality! These will replace all of my craftsman ones. Hex bolsters are extremely useful for helping achieve extra torque.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product especially for the price. I use them in aviation maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product, name and tool set. Way cheaper then the tool trucks and you get the same thing with more in it.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

product_meta.title: GEARWRENCH 20 Pc. Phillips/Slotted/Torx Screwdriver Set, Dual Material Handles - 80066
product_meta.description:
Size:UNITSGEARWRENCH screwdrivers are ergonomically designed to fit your hand while on the job. The tri lobe handle shape provides the best performance with the least amount of effort. The dual material of the handle is oil and solvent resistant. The tips have a black Oxide, non slip coating. The part numbers and sizes are laser etched on the blade.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Gear wrench 20-Piece master screwdriver set consisting of: 80012 1/4 x 1-1/2-Inch slotted screwdriver, 80018 3/16 x 6-Inch slotted with cabinet tip, 80013 1/4 x 4-Inch slotted screwdriver with hex bolster, 80014 1/4 x 6-Inch slotted screwdriver with hex bolster, 80023 5/16 x 6-Inch slotted screwdriver with hex bolster, 80022 3/8 x 8-Inch slotted screwdriver with hex bolster, 80000 no.0 x 2-1/2-Inch Phillips screwdriver, 80001 no.1 x 3-Inch Phillips screwdriver, 80004 no.2 x 1-1/2-Inch Phillips screwdriver, 80007 no.2 x 4-Inch Phillips with hex bolster, 80011 no.3 x 6-Inch Phillips with hex bolster, 80034 1.5 x 60 millimeter slotted screwdriver, 80035 2.0 x 60 millimeter slotted screwdriver, 80036 2.5 x 60 millimeter slotted screwdriver, 80031 no.00 x 60 millimeter Phillips screwdriver, 80032 no.0X 60 millimeter Phillips screwdriver, 80033 no.1 x 60 millimeter Phillips screwdriver, 80025 T15, 3/16 x 4-Inch Torx screwdriver, 80026 T20, 3/16 x 4-Inch torx screwdriver. Gear wrench tri-lobe ergonomic handle to obtain optimal balance of strength and comfort with speed zone for turning in lower torque applications. chrome vanadium steel shaft has size laser etched with part number and size provides for additional strength and rust resistant finish. Black oxide, non-slip tip.
feature_bullets: Ergonomic tri-lobe dual material handle provides the optimal balance of strength and efficiency
“Speed Zone” handle design for faster rotation in low-torque applications
Dual material handle offers a more comfortable grip and higher performance
Non-Slip black oxide tip for more secure fit in fastener
Blades laser etched with part number and size for quick identification
Oil and solvent resistant handle provides a longer tool life
Full polish alloy steel screwdriver shaft prevents rust and corrosion
Meets or exceeds ASME standards for performance and quality
